name: Publicly Accessible GCP Cloud SQL Instances with no/old TLS
query: { cloudSqlInstances (where: { AND: [ { publicAccessBlocked: false } { ipAddresses_SOME: { type: "PRIMARY" } authorizedNetworks_SOME: { value: "0.0.0.0/0" } } { OR: [ {tlsStatus: ""} {tlsStatus: "disabled"} {tlsMinimumVersion: 0} {tlsMinimumVersion: 1} {tlsMinimumVersion: 1.100000023841858} ] } ] }) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
